title: Wood Finishing
brief_description: Frank Klausz in this videos demonstrates the following skills: how to use a smoothing plane, a scraper and sandpaper; how to choose among oil, alcohol and water stains; how to apply tung oil or spar varnish; how to spray Lacquer; and how to French polish your work to an exquisitely glossy finish.
